book.title: The Happy Prince and Other Tales 快乐王子和其他故事
book.description: 简介： High above the city, on a tall column, stood the statue of the Happy Prince. He was gilded all over with thin leaves of fine gold, for eyes he had two bright sapphires, and a large red ruby glowed on his sword-hilt....
